resources.string: Something went wrong. Please try again
Server error. Wait a minute and please try again
Bad request error. Please try again
No internet connection. Please check your connection and try again
If the application hasn\'t got the required permissions granted it won\'t be able to read data and generate the training plan. Do you want to grant those permissions?
There is no information related to the goal. Please tap here to set a new goal
There are not any suggested training sessions
There is no information about you. Please tap here to complete your profile
There is no information about fatigue
An error occurred while updating our data with Health Connect
Data has been synchronized successfully! Changes may take a while to appear
Sorry. There are no training sessions available
Warmup 3 km at a comfortable pace (you should be able to maintain a conversation while running)
Follow a stretching routine before starting with the session
Follow a stretching routine to prevent injuries and to let the body recover from the exercise
Run 2 km as slow as you need to recover from the exercise
Try to breathe as deep as possible to increase the recovery
If you think you should be running faster or slower, do it. This is just indicative
Are you sure you want to logout?
Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action will be definitive and will delete all the information
You look extremely tired!\nRest is recommended
Sorry. There are no predictions available already. Please try again.
You are expected to reach your goal on
You are not expected to reach the goal before the raceday. Would you like to change your goal to
You are expected to reach the goal before the raceday. Would you like to change your goal to
You are expected to reach the goal before the raceday. Would you like to reduce the number of training days per week to
You are not expected to reach the goal before the raceday. Would you like to increase the number of training days per week to
User information have been updated successfully!
The form is not fully completed. Please completed the fields in red and try again
Personal information have been updated successfully!
Please select at least one training day please

First of all, we need you to configure a few things.\nTo use this application we need to be able to read your training sessions from Healt Connect. Please check if you have Health Connect installed in your device.\nOnce you are sure you have installed Health Connect you can continue.
Health Connect is not available on your device. We are sorry
Health Connect is already installed in your device!

Now that you have installed Health Connect please make sure you are syncronizing your training sessions with it.\nClick on the following button to grant permission to the application you usually use (e.g. Samsung Health, COROSâ€¦) to write data into Health Connect.\nAlso you have to grant read permission to TwinCoach, in order to take your data from Health Connect.
You need to grant permission to TwinCoach to be able to read your data. Thank you!
We are almost done now!\nJust please complete the following information. We need this information to create a customized training plan for each one of our athletes.
Please introduce the requested data. It is necessary to build a customized training plan
